nodes.text: Sven Kim was a male individual who operated as a pirate during the Galactic Civil War.
Kim was a descendant of Sélima Kim and, with his twin sister Hilma, the heir of the familial business. As his sister, he was beautiful, arrogant and ruthless.

A majority of the Sélima Kim members and residents didn't know who he was, regarding him as a mere pirate. He always used the spy network of the base to spot the better business and join the raids with the Bloodthirsty, his starship.
Some in the organization thought that Sven and his sister could have shared more than a fraternal relationship.
Sven Kim was created by Pierre Zaplotny for the ambiguously canon roleplaying article Sélima Kim: une base pirate which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 60.
